channel.title: Domain Approval
channel.description:
Hi, I was wondering if I can get the approval of my new domain?
I'm resurrecting an old server of mines that had over 600 players and I'd like to post the link on my server development thread. We don't support any type of malicious content and or hacking. I also have a moderator, an ex-moderator and a community member in my development team, we don't aim to cause any harm through this.
The domain is http://www.helix-world.org
I would've used my old one, but when I ended it I entered a contract with another website for redirection of my domain to theirs, and this contract stands for a further 4 months.
Regards, Ruby/Helix.

item.title: Domain Approval
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Going ahead and approving this.

Read full topic

item.title: Domain Approval
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I see nothing wrong with the site for a development post. No (working) play links yet, correct?

Also:

May want to fix that! Cheers.

Read full topic
